# üìù Pull Request Template

Thank you for contributing to **MSDEVBUILD-Doc**!  
Please follow this template to help us review your pull request quickly.

---

## Description

Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed.  
Also include relevant motivation and context.

- Related issue (if any): `#ISSUE_NUMBER`  
- Type of change:
  - [ ] New article/tutorial
  - [ ] Fix/typo in existing article
  - [ ] Add diagram/visual
  - [ ] Update README or contributing guidelines
  - [ ] Other (please explain)

---

## Checklist

- [ ] My code/documentation follows the repository structure and guidelines  
- [ ] I have added necessary screenshots, diagrams, or examples if applicable  
- [ ] I have proofread and checked markdown formatting  
- [ ] I have tested code examples (if any) and they work  

---

## Additional Notes

Add any additional information or context here (optional):

- New dependencies introduced (if any)  
- Special instructions to test/run changes  
- Anything else reviewers should know  

---

Thank you for your contribution! üéâ
